title: Saving Grace
creator_credit: Larry Parr, Kahukura Films, New Zealand Film Commission and Costa Botes
brief_description: When Grace, a homeless teenager whose emotional stability was shattered when her mother committed suicide, meets Gerald, an unemployed, compassionate carpenter, a tentative relationship develops between the two. Grace moves into Gerald’s house and their budding friendship gradually turns into love. Yet everything changes when Gerald reveals a stunning and incomprehensible secret— that he is the Son of God.
